name: Proteum Software
tag_list: application-development, applications, framework, platform, business-process-automation, workflow, batch-jobs, stream-management, interface-management, interfaces, three-tiered, cloud, business-processes
overview:
Proteum is an enterprise-focussed company providing innovative, three-tiered software products and services for enterprises of all sizes.

The company offers a range of seamlessly integrated software products, all built on Proteum’s innovative application development framework (called PLESIA), allowing for efficiency, performance, consistency and ease of use.

PLESIA dramatically reduces the cost of application development and maintenance using industry standard programming languages, whilst simultaneously improving application quality, security and performance.

Proteum’a other integrated software products built on the PLESIA platform are used for defining and automating business processes (PLESIAPROCESS), for managing large volumes of application interfaces (PLESIACONNECT) and for orchestrating complex streams of background jobs (PLESIASTREAMS).

All software products, and all applications built on the PLESIA platform, have a three-tiered architecture and are enabled for the private, public or hybrid cloud.

The company also offers Consulting Services to help companies integrate their chosen Proteum software product(s) into their organisation. Their experienced staff can work with any organisation to cover the full lifecycle of application development from identifying requirements, to design, build and deployment.

The Proteum team has significant business and technical skills and knowledge with a proven track record of successfully developing and deploying software and solutions in medium, large and corporate level organisations.
